benchmark_details.name: SciPostLayout
benchmark_details.overview: SciPostLayout is the first scientific poster layout dataset for layout analysis and generation, containing 7,855 scientific posters with manual layout annotations and 100 scientific papers paired with the posters.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a dataset for evaluating layout analysis and generation systems in the context of scientific posters.

data.source: Poster images downloaded from F1000Research and manually annotated by professional annotators.
data.annotation: Manually annotated with categories of layout elements.

methodology.calculation: Metrics were calculated as described in the methodology section of the paper.
methodology.interpretation: Higher mAP and mIoU indicate better performance for layout analysis; lower values of FID indicate better similarity in layout generation.
methodology.validation: Evaluated using existing models on the defined tasks.
